author: MSNBC
title: Chernobyl isn't the biggest nuclear risk. Ukraine's active nuclear power plants are.
description: There is growing concern about four active nuclear power plants as Russia's invasion of Ukraine continues.
content: While much attention has been paid to Chernobyl this week as Russia's invasion of Ukraine continues, there is growing concern about the four active nuclear power plants that supply half of the nationâ€¦ [+6890 chars]
